assignments.title: Assignment 1: Project Proposal
assignments.description: Submit a one-page project proposal outlining the problem you want to solve, your proposed solution, and the expected outcomes.

assignments.title: Assignment 2: Literature Review
assignments.description: Conduct a literature review on existing solutions and technologies related to your project. Summarize your findings in a 3-page report.

assignments.title: Assignment 3: Mid-term Presentation
assignments.description: Prepare and deliver a 10-minute presentation on your project's progress, including a demo of your prototype.

courseInfo: This course provides an introduction to the principles of innovation and business engineering. Students will learn how to identify and solve real-world problems using a combination of design thinking, business strategy, and technology.
syllabus: The full syllabus can be found on the course website: [link to syllabus]
